title: Joyful Trouble
description: A humorous read about an incredible dog and how he had found his true, yet unexpected calling.A dog. A friendship. A purpose.When a Great Dane arrives in a navy base nobody expects him to win everybodyâ€™s hearts, although breaking some rules along the way. But things soon turn sour as somebody threatens to put him to sleep. Who will stand up for this for-legged gentle giant? Tackling universal themes and voicing animal rights and the importance of fighting for what is right.
author: Patricia  Furstenberg
